languages.text: "Потоки варпа бушуют в системе уже не первый десяток циклов, из-за чего завеса между нашим миром и {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериумом{/g}, здесь, на станции, практически истерлась. {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Губительные силы{/g} пытаются прорвать ее окончательно и опорочить все живое. И слуги... стали первыми жертвами. О, их тела извратились, а боль и отчаяние свели несчастных с ума. Безумцы захватили в плен мою госпожу и почти разрушили станцию, ну а я собрал подле тех немногих, кто еще следует за светом {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}, дабы все исправить".

traits.locale_text: "Потоки варпа бушуют в системе уже не первый десяток циклов, из-за чего завеса между нашим миром и {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериумом{/g}, здесь, на станции, практически истерлась. {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Губительные силы{/g} пытаются прорвать ее окончательно и опорочить все живое. И слуги... стали первыми жертвами. О, их тела извратились, а боль и отчаяние свели несчастных с ума. Безумцы захватили в плен мою госпожу и почти разрушили станцию, ну а я собрал подле тех немногих, кто еще следует за светом {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}, дабы все исправить".

languages.text: "The warp currents in the system have been tumultuous for dozens of cycles and have worn the veil between our world and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} thin and frail, at least here on the station. The {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} are trying to tear it down completely and corrupt all living things. The servants... were the first to fall victim to it. Oh, their bodies morphed, and pain and despair drove the poor souls mad. The lunatics took my mistress prisoner and almost destroyed the station, but I rallied the few who still followed the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} to set things right."
languages.original_text: "Потоки варпа бушуют в системе уже не первый десяток циклов, из-за чего завеса между нашим миром и {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериумом{/g}, здесь, на станции, практически истерлась. {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Губительные силы{/g} пытаются прорвать ее окончательно и опорочить все живое. И слуги... стали первыми жертвами. О, их тела извратились, а боль и отчаяние свели несчастных с ума. Безумцы захватили в плен мою госпожу и почти разрушили станцию, ну а я собрал подле тех немногих, кто еще следует за светом {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}, дабы все исправить".

traits.locale_text: "The warp currents have been buffeting this system for dozens of cycles and wore the veil between our world and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} ragged and thin, at least here on the station. The {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} are trying to tear it away completely and corrupt all living things. The servants... were the first to fall victim to the malignant influence. Oh, how twisted their bodies became even as pain and despair drove the poor souls mad. The lunatics took my mistress prisoner and almost destroyed the station, but I rallied the few still following the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} to set things right."

"The warp currents have been buffeting this system for dozens of cycles and wore the veil between our world and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} ragged and thin, at least here on the station. The {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} are trying to tear it away completely and corrupt all living things. The servants... were the first to fall victim to the malignant influence. The lunatics took my mistress prisoner and almost destroyed the station, but I rallied the few still following the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} to set things right."

The {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} are trying to tear it down completely and corrupt all living things. The servants... were the first to fall victim to it. The lunatics took my mistress prisoner and almost destroyed the station, but I rallied the few who still followed the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} to set things right."

languages.text: "Die Warpströmungen im System sind seit Dutzenden von Zyklen äußerst turbulent. Sie haben den Schleier zwischen unserer Welt und dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} zerschlissen, zumindest hier auf der Station. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Mächte der Zerstörung{/g} versuchen, ihn vollständig hinunterzureißen und alles Lebende zu korrumpieren. Die Diener ... sind ihm als Erste zum Opfer gefallen. Oh, ihre Körper haben sich verwandelt, und Schmerz und Verzweiflung haben die armen Seelen in den Wahnsinn getrieben. Die Wahnsinnigen haben meine Herrin gefangen genommen und hätten die Station fast zerstört. Doch ich konnte die Wenigen, die noch dem Licht des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} folgten, zu einem Widerstand formieren."
languages.original_text: "The warp currents in the system have been tumultuous for dozens of cycles and have worn the veil between our world and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} thin and frail, at least here on the station. The {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} are trying to tear it down completely and corrupt all living things. The servants... were the first to fall victim to it. Sie haben den Schleier zwischen unserer Welt und dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} zerschlissen, zumindest hier auf der Station. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Mächte der Zerstörung{/g} versuchen, ihn vollständig hinunterzureißen und alles Lebende zu korrumpieren. Die Diener ... sind ihm als Erste zum Opfer gefallen. Oh, ihre Körper haben sich verwandelt, und Schmerz und Verzweiflung haben die armen Seelen in den Wahnsinn getrieben. Die Wahnsinnigen haben meine Herrin gefangen genommen und hätten die Station fast zerstört. Doch ich konnte die Wenigen, die noch dem Licht des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} folgten, zu einem Widerstand formieren."

languages.text: « Les courants du Warp dans le système sont tumultueux depuis des dizaines de cycles et ont aminci et fragilisé le voile entre notre monde et l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, du moins ici, à cette station. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Puissances de la Ruine{/g} tentent de le déchirer complètement pour corrompre tous les êtres vivants. Les serviteurs... ont été les premières victimes. Leurs corps se sont métamorphosés, et la douleur et le désespoir ont mené ces pauvres à la folie. Ces cinglés ont capturé ma maîtresse et presque détruit la station, mais j'ai pu rassembler ceux qui suivaient encore la lumière du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} pour redresser la barre. »
languages.original_text: "The warp currents in the system have been tumultuous for dozens of cycles and have worn the veil between our world and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} thin and frail, at least here on the station. The {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} are trying to tear it down completely and corrupt all living things. The servants... were the first to fall victim to it. Oh, their bodies morphed, and pain and despair drove the poor souls mad. The lunatics took my mistress prisoner and almost destroyed the station, but I rallied the few who still followed the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} to set things right."

traits.locale_text: « Les courants du Warp dans le système sont tumultueux depuis des dizaines de cycles et ont aminci et fragilisé le voile entre notre monde et l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, du moins ici, à cette station. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Puissances de la Ruine{/g} tentent de le déchirer complètement pour corrompre tous les êtres vivants. Les serviteurs... ont été les premières victimes. Leurs corps se sont métamorphosés, et la douleur et le désespoir ont mené ces pauvres à la folie. Ces cinglés ont capturé ma maîtresse et presque détruit la station, mais j'ai pu rassembler ceux qui suivaient encore la lumière du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} pour redresser la barre. »

languages.text: “这片星系的亚空间湍流已经至少骚动了几十个周期。至少在这座星站，我们的世界与{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}之间的屏障已经变得脆弱不堪。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}毁灭之力{/g}打算彻底摧毁这座星站，腐化所有的生物，而那些仆人……是第一批受害者。噢，他们的身体遭到了扭曲，心智也被痛苦与绝望逼疯了。那群疯子把我的女主人关押起来，几乎摧毁了这座星站。不过，我还是召集了少数仍然追随{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}圣光的人，准备从叛徒手里夺回一切。”
languages.original_text: "The warp currents in the system have been tumultuous for dozens of cycles and have worn the veil between our world and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} thin and frail, at least here on the station. The {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} are trying to tear it down completely and corrupt all living things. The servants... were the first to fall victim to it. Oh, their bodies morphed, and pain and despair drove the poor souls mad. The lunatics took my mistress prisoner and almost destroyed the station, but I rallied the few who still followed the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} to set things right."

traits.locale_text: “这片星系的亚空间湍流已经至少骚动了几十个周期。至少在这座星站，我们的世界与{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}之间的屏障已经变得脆弱不堪。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}毁灭之力{/g}打算彻底摧毁这座星站，腐化所有的生物，而那些仆人……是第一批受害者。噢，他们的身体遭到了扭曲，心智也被痛苦与绝望逼疯了。那群疯子把我的女主人关押起来，几乎摧毁了这座星站。不过，我还是召集了少数仍然追随{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}圣光的人，准备从叛徒手里夺回一切。”

languages.text: 「星系の<歪み>の流れは何十サイクルにもわたって激しく動き、私達の惑星と{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}の間の薄くて脆いヴェールをすり減らしている。少なくとも、このステーションではそうだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}〈禍つ神々〉{/g}は、ヴェールを完全に破壊して、あらゆる生物を腐敗させようとしているのさ。従者達は…最初の犠牲者だった。あぁ、彼らの体は変形して、痛みと絶望が悲しき魂を狂わせてしまった。狂った者達は主を捕虜にして、ステーションをほとんど破壊してしまったが、私は{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の御光に従う残り少ない物達を集め、事態を修復しようとしているところだよ」
languages.original_text: "The warp currents in the system have been tumultuous for dozens of cycles and have worn the veil between our world and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} thin and frail, at least here on the station. The {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} are trying to tear it down completely and corrupt all living things. The servants... were the first to fall victim to it. Oh, their bodies morphed, and pain and despair drove the poor souls mad. The lunatics took my mistress prisoner and almost destroyed the station, but I rallied the few who still followed the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} to set things right."

traits.locale_text: 「星系の<歪み>の流れは何十サイクルにもわたって激しく動き、私達の惑星と{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}の間の薄くて脆いヴェールをすり減らしている。少なくとも、このステーションではそうだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}〈禍つ神々〉{/g}は、ヴェールを完全に破壊して、あらゆる生物を腐敗させようとしているのさ。従者達は…最初の犠牲者だった。あぁ、彼らの体は変形して、痛みと絶望が悲しき魂を狂わせてしまった。狂った者達は主を捕虜にして、ステーションをほとんど破壊してしまったが、私は{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の御光に従う残り少ない物達を立ち直らせて、事態を元に戻そうとしているところだよ」

「星系の<歪み>の流れは何十サイクルにもわたって激しく動き、私達の惑星と{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}の間の薄くて脆いヴェールをすり減らしている。少なくとも、このステーションではそうだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}〈禍つ神々〉{/g}は、ヴェールを完全に破壊して、あらゆる生物を腐敗させようとしているのさ。従者達は…最初の犠牲者だった。あぁ、彼らの体は変形して、痛みと絶望が悲しき魂を狂わせてしまった。狂った者達は主を捕虜にして、ステーションをほとんど破壊してしまったが、私は{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の御光に従う残り少ない物達を集め、事態を修復しようとしているところだよ」

languages.text: «Las corrientes de la disformidad del sistema llevan en turbulencia varias docenas de ciclos, desgastando el velo que separa nuestro mundo del {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Inmaterio{/g}, por lo menos en la estación. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Poderes Ruinosos{/g} buscan rasgarlo por completo para corromper a todos los seres vivos. Los sirvientes... fueron sus primeras víctimas. Sus cuerpos se deformaron y el dolor y la desesperación hicieron enloquecer a esos desdichados. Los lunáticos capturaron a mi señora y estuvieron a punto de destruir la estación, pero pude reunir a los pocos que quedamos al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} para enmendar la situación».
languages.original_text: "The warp currents in the system have been tumultuous for dozens of cycles and have worn the veil between our world and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} thin and frail, at least here on the station. The {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} are trying to tear it down completely and corrupt all living things. The servants... were the first to fall victim to it. Oh, their bodies morphed, and pain and despair drove the poor souls mad. The lunatics took my mistress prisoner and almost destroyed the station, but I rallied the few who still followed the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} to set things right."

traits.locale_text: «Las corrientes de la disformidad del sistema llevan en turbulencia varias docenas de ciclos, desgastando el velo que separa nuestro mundo del {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Inmaterio{/g}, por lo menos en la estación. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Poderes Ruinosos{/g} buscan rasgarlo por completo para corromper a todos los seres vivos. Los sirvientes... fueron sus primeras víctimas. Sus cuerpos se deformaron y el dolor y la desesperación hicieron enloquecer a esos desdichados. Los lunáticos capturaron a mi señora y estuvieron a punto de destruir la estación, pero pude reunir a los pocos que quedamos al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} para enmendar la situación».

languages.text: "Sistemin öteboyut akıntıları, düzinelerce döngüdür çalkantılı seyrediyor ve bu durum, dünyamızla {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Tindiyar'ı{/g} birbirinden ayıran örtüyü, en azından bu istasyonda çok yıpratıp inceltti. {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Yıkıcı Güçler{/g}, örtüyü hepten parçalayıp tüm canlıları yozlaştırmak niyetinde. Hizmetkârlar da... İlk kurbanları oldu. Bedenleri çarpılıp değişti, acı ve çaresizlikten akılları başlarından gitti. Hanımımı esir aldıkları yetmezmiş gibi manyaklar az kalsın istasyonu da yok ediyordu. Lakin düzeni sağlayabilmek adına, hâlâ {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'ın{/g} ışığından sapmadan kalabilmiş birkaçını topladım."
languages.original_text: "The warp currents in the system have been tumultuous for dozens of cycles and have worn the veil between our world and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} thin and frail, at least here on the station. The {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} are trying to tear it down completely and corrupt all living things. The servants... were the first to fall victim to it. Oh, their bodies morphed, and pain and despair drove the poor souls mad. The lunatics took my mistress prisoner and almost destroyed the station, but I rallied the few who still followed the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} to set things right."

Hizmetkârlar da... İlk kurbanları oldu. Bedenleri çarpılıp değişti, acı ve çaresizlikten akılları başlarından gitti. Hanımımı esir aldıkları yetmezmiş gibi manyaklar az kalsın istasyonu da yok ediyordu. Lakin düzeni sağlayabilmek adına, hâlâ {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g}'ın ışığından sapmadan kalabilmiş birkaçını topladım."
